# colorPicker(withIdentifier:buttonImage:)

**Type Method**

Creates a color picker bar item using the supplied image as its icon.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class func colorPicker(withIdentifier identifier: NSTouchBarItem.Identifier, buttonImage image: NSImage) -> Self
```

```swift
@MainActor class func colorPicker(withIdentifier identifier: NSTouchBarItem.Identifier, buttonImage image: UIImage) -> Self
```

## Creating a color picker item

- **colorPicker(withIdentifier:)**: Creates a bar item with the standard color picker icon.
- **textColorPicker(withIdentifier:)**: Creates a bar item with the standard text color picker icon.
- **strokeColorPicker(withIdentifier:)**: Creates a bar item with the standard stroke color picker icon.
